subject: United Nations (UN),compensati
body:
United Nations (UN),compensation unit.
ADD: km 7/10 Tunde automotive Marina,Lagos.Nigeria.
EMAIL:- (
unncu202038@yahoo.com
 )
DATE:-28- 09 - 2023
From the desk of Mr. James Martina.
UNITED NATION West Africa coordinator,
Attention Please, Read Carefully AND REPLY TO : (
revhpeters1@aol.com
)
This email is to all the people who fell Victims of CORONA VIRUS PANDEMIC in one way or the other and the people who have been scammed or extorted money from because of their contract winning payment execution in any part of the world, the United Nations have agreed to compensate you with the sum of THREE MILLION AND FIVE HUNDRED THOUSAND UNITED STATE DOLLARS( $3.5 MILLION ). This includes every foreign contractor that may have not received their contract sum, and people that have had an unfinished transaction or international businesses that failed due to problems or irregularities by governments, etc.
We found your email in the list that is why we are contacting you
; this has been agreed upon and has been signed by the Board of Directors and Trustees of the United Nations Compensation Unit.
You have to contact Mr. Mike Load, our payment agent in West Africa, as he is our UNITED NATIONS representative in West Africa, contact him immediately for your Compensation fund worth $3.5 MILLION. The fund is in an International Certified Bank Check/draft for security purpose.
Contact him now on :
NAME:- Rev. Hudson Peters
EMAIL:- (
revhpeters1@aol.com
)
CONTACT PHONE: +234-8122-0944-02.
You are advised to send your communication data ,
1.Full names :
2.Age:
3.Occupation:
4.Country :
5.Phone:
6.Fax numbers :
7.Delivery address :
8.
A Scan Copy of your identity
 :
9.The reference file ( RE - 1110 )
To let him know that you are the real person
.
Contact Mr. Mike Load now for immediate release of your International Certified Bank Check/Draft($3.5m) to you.
Making the world a better place for the good of humanity . Give him your file reference ( RE -1110 )and you are free to contact him upon receipt of this email.
Thank you and God bless you and your family. Hoping to hear from you as soon as you receive your fund ( 
unncu202038@yahoo.com
).
Best regards,
Mr. James Martina.
UNITED NATION West African co-ordinator.

subject: Re: United Nations (UN),compensati
body:
Hello Mr. James Martina,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have shared regarding compensation for those affected by the COVID-19 pandemic and scams. It's good to know that organizations like the United Nations are working towards helping people in difficult situations.

I would like to learn more about this compensation program. Could you please provide me with some additional details? How exactly does it work? Are there any specific criteria or requirements that need to be met in order to receive the compensation?

Also, I noticed that you mentioned contacting Mr. Mike Load as the payment agent in West Africa. Could you please clarify his role and how he is connected to this compensation process? What steps should I take to get in touch with him?

Thank you again for your assistance, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Timothy
